The link to Outdoor Tech Chips 3.0 Bluetooth Helmet Speakers has been copied

* * *

Description

The Chips are Bluetooth speakers that fit inside your snow helmet. A
rechargeable battery gives you 10 hours of playtime. Listen to music,
podcasts, or make phone calls while on the mountain or sitting on the lift.
Your ski helmet or snowboard helmet will never be the same after you get the
Chips wireless speakers for snow helmet audio.

No wires, no need to take off your gloves and you can leave your phone in your
pocket.

Works with nearly any audio compatible snow helmet, the Chips stream music
from your Bluetooth audio device, completely wirelessly. Each earpiece
features a single oversized button that you can operate easily with your
mittens still on. Simple button press combinations let you control every
feature without ever removing your device from your pocket.

The Bluetooth connection, built-in microphone, and simple button interface of
the Chips mean you can answer your next call without removing your helmet or
gloves. No more fishing in your pants or pulling off your lid to tell your Ma
you’ll be home in time for dinner. Just make sure you hang up before you start
hassling ski patrol or debating skate laws with the police.

The Chips Bluetooth helmet speakers are compatible with helmets from the
following manufacturers (and possibly more), as long as they have slots for
audio drop-ins: Bern, Giro, Smith, K2, Anon, Pro-Tec, Bolle, Sweet Protection

* * *
